entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Good Hope Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:41 PM PST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -7.3°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 10:40 PM PST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Snow over southern sections in the morning. Amount 2 cm except 10 cm over southern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 10:40 PM PST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm over southern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 10:40 PM PST Saturday 11 February 2023
